snippet: A severe thunderstorm warning was issued for the area around the time of the tent collapse at a fairground in Lancaster, N.H.
abstract: Circus tent collapses in northern New Hampshire because of severe weather, killing two people and injuring at least 22 others.
lead_paragraph: A severe thunderstorm warning was issued for the area around the time of the tent collapse at a fairground in Lancaster, N.H.

headline.main: Circus Tent Collapses in New Hampshire, Killing at Least 2
headline.print_headline: 2 Dead as Storm Strikes Tent at Circus in New Hampshire
